sub_title: LL.M Candidate in Intellectual Property Law and Knowledge Management at Maastricht University
summary: Hi I’m Sahel, I have obtained an LL.B in European Law with a minor in Law and Technology in 2022. I am pursuing the advanced master program at Maastricht University in Intellectual Property Law and Knowledge Management, graduating in 2023.

- Conducted comprehensive reviews of contracts, license agreements, purchase orders, and other legal documents, providing well-informed and valuable legal opinions.
- Re-drafted agreements, and terms and conditions, ensuring accuracy, clarity, and compliance with legal standards.', 'title': 'Legal Intern', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 27244623, 'name': 'Maastricht University Faculty of Law', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHgxqed2HaGqw/company-logo_400_400/0/1615278904163?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=UdfSsZKZ2djcmo_xvwLwHKqiCKY9v7sDPqQud-uKY0Y', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/maastricht-university-faculty-of-law/', 'employees': {'start': 201, 'end': 500}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Maastricht, Limburg, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Maastricht University Faculty of Law', 'description': 'Student tutors are part of the Talent Scouting Programme intended for the most ambitious and promising students of the Maastricht University Faculty of Law. 

Prior to beginning to teach, I was provided extensive training, with the main focus being put on the problem-based learning approach of the University. During the teaching process I will receive peer and staff coaching to ensure I am maintaining high quality skills but also always improving.

I have so far taught EU Substantive Law, Introduction to International and European Law, Concepts of Criminal Procedure, and Comparative Contract Law.

I have also played an active role as part of the selection team for new student tutors, contributing to the identification and recruitment of talented individuals. 

Conducted comprehensive training sessions for new staff members and student tutors equipping them with the necessary skills and knowledge to effectively navigate Maastricht University’s teaching system; PBL.', 'title': 'Teaching Assistant', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 9306830, 'name': 'ELSA Maastricht', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHhyZ_XSXU7Ig/company-logo_400_400/0/1534149156678?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=j-nujPl9NlI1XNfYJinHkYADRYwBPwY386beCdpaK-M', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/elsa-maastricht/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Maastricht', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'ELSA Maastricht', 'description': '- Established and led a dedicated committee responsible for marketing initiatives for ELSA, demonstrating strong leadership skills and the ability to drive successful marketing campaigns.
- Actively maintained and strengthened ELSA’s brand identity, ensuring consistency across all marketing materials and channels, fostering strong collaboration with other ELSA boards from various cities and countries, establishing a unified and impactful global presence', 'title': 'Vice President Marketing', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 61827, 'name': 'Afridi & Angell', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQGyUj6C1LIQ3w/company-logo_400_400/0/1527071928331?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=PaqbbvDi5NwjFF-y7aHnz20grdmonNVMYexrA1maWd4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/afridi-angell/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Dubai, United Arab Emirates', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Afridi & Angell', 'description': "- Worked closely under the direct supervision of partner; Shahram Safai, conducting extensive research for attorneys and partners at the firm, providing valuable insights and support for their legal cases and projects.
- Demonstrated an international outlook, focusing particularly on legal systems and practices in UK, US, Canada, UAE, and Sudan, enhancing cross-border legal knowledge and understanding.

Research in the following areas:
- Canadian Inheritance Law
- Sudan and it's economic potential
- English Contract Law; specifically in relation to breaches of contract
- recent U.A.E. Decrees in Real Estate Law 
- U.A.E laws regarding e-commerce law 
- Rights provided for under General Conditions of the Contract for Construction in USA and its application to specific contracts provided.

Tasked with organization and documentation of case evidence.

Helped in drafting an Email briefing a client regarding the presence of any pending or threatened litigation.

Received advice on how to efficiently and effectively approach a future in law.", 'title': 'Intern', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}]
